trans-unit.source: An interface that implements a callback that is called just before a message is sent on the wire by the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send" /> or <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendParametersContent" /> activities.
trans-unit.target: 介面，這個介面會實作 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendParametersContent" /> 活動在網路上傳送訊息前所呼叫的回呼。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ISendMessageCallback> interface to a new header to a message before it is sent out on the wire.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何實作<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ISendMessageCallback>訊息前在網路上送出新的標頭的介面。

trans-unit.source: The operation’s context under which the message is being sent.
trans-unit.target: 作業內容，訊息會在這個內容中傳送。

trans-unit.source: Executed when a service message is sent.
trans-unit.target: 在傳送服務訊息時執行。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ISendMessageCallback> interface to a new header to a message before it is sent out on the wire.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何實作<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ISendMessageCallback>訊息前在網路上送出新的標頭的介面。
